item.description:
Hi Everyone,

This is a simple BRING YOUR OWN FLOAT TUBE or whatever and go down a few rapids on a local river..
You can ride these rapids over and over and it only takes 2 or so minutes to walk to the beginning again..

SOOOOOOOO

Bring some chairs, TUBES , bug spray, food, adult bugg juice, and be ready for a splash.

I will have the fire pit..or use real wood.. the grille and some food..or whatever else i think would be good for this kind of event..



Description:
DIRECTIONS:
From Interstate 91 to Parking lot

Take Exit 47 East. Go eastbound 2.7 miles on RT-190 (Hazard Avenue) from Enfield to Hazardville.

At intersection of RT-190 and North/South Maple (RT 192) turn right (South) onto South Maple.

Parking is at the barn on the right located right before the bridge. OR DIRECTLY AFTER THE BRIDGE...if ther is no cars there

From Interstate 84 via RT-190 to Parking and HQ: 1: Take the RT-190 West Exit and follow RT-190 West through Stafford Springs and Somers to Hazardville (Intersection R-190 and RT-192).
2: At stoplight, turn left on to South Maple.
3: Parking is at the barn located by the bridge. or after the bridge..

Just look for the striped Cones....

apx 1 - 100 South Maple, Hazardville (Enfield) ct 06082 for a GPS (Just follow the directions above).

OK WE WILL BE NEAR THE WATER OR CLOSE ENOUGH, Most likely a picnick table or where ever we find a good spot...
I am bringing the colman lantern, its pretty bright..ya wont miss that thing..


see you there if you are interested...
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Orange Cone on Roof of car & other places, in bridge or barn parkin lot

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Local River TUBING event
